synopsis.text: World wide stardom is just a virtual reality away in the year 2035, where idols perform live events in 'VR Rooms' for a global audience. As the craze for virtual idols soars, the Kanon Private Academy on Beginning Island becomes the breeding ground for new talent. Two rival idol groups, StarRing and Shadow, emerge from the academy, each vying for the top spot in the coveted World Idol League. Follow the journey of Vivi, Kokona, Sena, Miku, Nanami, and Yucho as they compete for the ultimate symbol of idol supremacy - the tiara. Will they rise to the top or crumble under the pressure? Only time will tell in this thrilling anime set in a future where virtual reality reigns supreme.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
